title: Samantha Eggar, Star of ‘Doctor Dolittle,’ Cronenberg’s ‘The Brood,’ Dies at 86
summary: English-born Samantha Eggar, who was Oscar nominated — and received the Golden Globe and the best actress award at the Cannes Film Festival — for her performance in thriller “The Collector” before starring in “Doctor Dolittle” and later David Cronenberg’s early horror masterpiece “The Brood,” died …
